aka: The rise and fall of Jacques Tati
this_title: Jacques Tati, tombé de la lune
trans_title: The rise and fall of Jacques Tati
introduction: The wild rise and fall of the comedy genius, actor, director, and laughter athlete Jacques Tati—or how the creator of the famous Monsieur Hulot stole the heart of the French, and then of the world, through laughter, leaping from one success to another, rising always higher—until he flew a bit too close to the sun. A fascinating dive into the creative process of this extraordinary director.PRESENT IN THESE COLLECTIONS:PORTRAITS OF ARTISTSCINÉMA & PHOTOGRAPHIEDirector	Jean-Baptiste PéretiéScript	Jean-Baptiste PéretiéProduction	Corine JaninProduction Manager	Cécile PeyreLine Producer	Stéphane MillièreAssociate Producer	Philippe GigotEditing	Solveig RisacherNarration	Denis PodalydèsSound mixing	Amélie CaniniGraphic Creation	Thomas FageMusic	Stéphane Lopez
chinese_title: Jacques Tati, tombé de la lune
